name: color-json
description: Color JSON in the console with no dependencies

scripts.test:
node tests/test.js; TMP_FORCE_NO_COLOR=$FORCE_NO_COLOR; export FORCE_NO_COLOR=true; echo '=====================
Testing without color
====================='; node tests/test.js; export FORCE_NO_COLOR=$TMP_FORCE_NO_COLOR; unset TMP_FORCE_NO_COLOR

author: Adam Quinton
